## Intra-Office Memorandum

**To:** All Employees

**From:** [Your Name]

**Date:** [Date]

**Subject:** Restriction on Instant Messaging Programs

**Effective immediately, all office communications are restricted to email correspondence and official memos.** The use of Instant Message (IM) programs by employees during working hours is strictly prohibited.

This policy applies to all communications, both internal and external. This means that employees are not allowed to use IM programs to communicate with clients, colleagues, or anyone else outside of the office.

The use of IM programs can be disruptive and can lead to a loss of productivity. We have found that many employees are spending too much time using IM programs, which is taking away from their work.

We understand that some employees may use IM programs to communicate with clients. However, there are other ways to communicate with clients, such as email and phone. We encourage employees to use these alternative methods of communication.

**Any employee who persists in using Instant Messaging will first receive a warning and be placed on probation. At second offense, the employee will face termination.**

If you have any questions about this policy, please contact your department head.

Thank you for your cooperation.

**[Your Name]**
